https://tmrev.io/movie/10051-Avenue Montaigne 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yuqNuzUHr7K6TJh6IXQdfDUasRX.jpg A young woman arrives in Paris where she finds a job as a waitress in bar next on Avenue Montaigne that caters to the surrounding theaters and the wealthy inhabitants of the area. She will meet a pianist, a famous actress and a great art collector, and become acquainted with the "luxurious" world her grandmother has told her about since her childhood. Avenue Montaigne
